item.title: Business Trips
item.description: Chalmer’s Guidelines In the following link you can find the official guide from chalmers to book a trip: https://intranet.chalmers.se/en/tools-support/general-support-services/conferences-meetings-business-travel/business-travels/book-a-trip/ This link gives the basic guidelines for what expenses are covered and how you should pay for them and register them: https://intranet.chalmers.se/en/tools-support/general-support-services/conferences-meetings-business-travel/business-travels/expenses-travel-bill-and-entertainment/ Travel Approval Before you go: Find out cost estimate, check with your supervisor if your project can cover the cost. Fill in a BTA form (This form might be outdated, ask your division secretary just in case) (the form will be sent to your division head for signature and to your division secretary for reference).

item.title: Benefits (Discounts)
item.description: Health expense refund As a Chalmers employee you have the right to be refunded for up to 2000SEK/year for expenses related to health and wellness. This can be done through a portal called Benify. There you can directly buy discounted gym memberships, book massages, etc, making use of your wellness refund. You can also send in receipts and be reimbursed, see below: How to claim expenses and to get refunds Go to insidan On the right-most column select Chalmers Plus in the menu under ‘E-tjanst’, clic visa Insert CID and CID-password Click on ‘wellness receipts’ Follow instruction on how to register a receipt (useful instructions in english also under ‘How do I register my expenses?

item.title: Rooms
item.description: Rooms To find the location of rooms on campus you can go to Map (online/app) or download the Chalmers map app for smartphones. Booking a room To book a room you need to create an event in the exchange calendar for that room. Log in to the Outlook webmail client), go to the Calendar tab and click on new to create a new event. Click on ‘Add a location or a room’ and then ‘Add room’ and you will see which rooms are available at the chosen time.

item.title: Library
item.description: Access material when off-campus Add your publications to CLP Books You can request and access material such as books and articles you need for you research at the Library website You can request/recommand a (paper/online) book for library. (the book doesn’t necessary need to be relevant to your research area). Lending times: Books : 1-3 weeks E-book, articles: 1-3 days

item.title: Printers
item.description: Printer Web interface to printers You can use web interface to see nearby printers, download drivers or directly send pdf, txt files to be printed. Setup on linux with SMB (tested on Ubuntu 18.x, 16.x, 14.x, 12.x) See instructions here. Setup on Windows Printing via ipp/kerberos: Copy krb5.conf in this repository to /etc/krb5.conf and run: test -d $HOME/.cups || mkdir $HOME/.cups cat <<EOF >$HOME/.cups/client.conf ServerName print.chalmers.se GSSServiceName HTTP EOF In older versions of CUPS, you may have to add those lines to the system-wide configuration file in /etc/cups/client.
